revised_title: Researches in Circular Solar Spectra and the Construction of a Compensating Eyepiece
tldr: The author investigates circular solar spectra and their applications in testing residual aberration in microscopes and telescopes. They develop a compensating eyepiece and explore the effects of various optical errors on the accuracy of observations. The research also highlights the importance of accurate definition in microscopy and the potential impact of residual errors on delicate observations.
